ygData.subject: Hiden spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Im interested in any runes wich are not on books, im looking for them so that we can finaly find at last some of hiden spells, as a verant guys declared
ygData.messageBody:
Im interested in any runes wich are not on books, im looking for them so
that we can finaly find at last some of hiden spells, as a verant guys
declared somwere on board THERE is at last one spell for level wich is
without recipte in book !

Until now i got one email that one person found a rune of snow! Also i have
a idea that ALL existing spells can be created thru research ( after lv 16)
anyone have sucesfuly researched any other spell wich is not receipe in
book, any of spells wich you can buy in shops? Also if you have ideas wich
components you think can combine in any existing spell lets try it! Maybe
there is hiden strenghts of int based casters what verant talk so much about!



Silverion Dragonirder
